mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_items(order_id, product_id, unit_price, quantity, line_total) VALUES(#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{unitPrice}, #{quantity}, #{lineTotal})
mapper.select: SELECT id, order_id, product_id, unit_price, quantity, line_total, created_at, updated_at FROM order_items WHERE order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY id

SELECT p.id AS product_id, p.name AS product_name, oi.unit_price AS unit_price, oi.quantity AS quantity, oi.line_total AS line_total FROM order_items oi JOIN products p ON p.id = oi.product_id WHERE oi.order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY oi.id
